item.title: Armory Proof Of Payment
item.description: I am going to talk about proof of payment. This is simple. You can do this. That you couldn’t do before 2008. We’ll see if this works. I hear it might work. That’s okay, I’ll pull this up here. I have ruined everything. Just jam that in there. Here we go. So uh, I said who I am. Bitcoin Armory. I am here to talk about proof of payment. Basically, let’s talk about Armory first real quick.
